== Mundur-I (627634) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mundur-I is a village in the [[Palakkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 1829 hectares and harbouring 4644 households with total population of 20334 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 9780 and female population is 10554. Scheduled Caste Population is 3127 and Scheduled Tribes population is 12. Census Location Code of the village is 627634<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 16267 (80.0%)
* Literate male population: 8197 (83.81%)
* Literate female population: 8070 (76.46%)
